author: Tom Winter
title: Fifteen percent of the NYPD is out sick
description: Approximately 15 percent of the New York Police Department's 37,000-member uniformed workforce has called out sick, a number that continues to increase.
content:
Approximately 15 percent of the New York Police Departments 37,000-member uniformed workforce has called out sick, Commissioner Dermont Shea said in a Q&A on Periscope Tuesday. The number of sick officers continues to increase.
